.btn{position:relative}.news-alert.hide{display:none}.news-alert .alert,.news-alert .close,.news-alert .type{display:block;height:3.125rem;padding-top:.125rem}.news-alert .close .valign,.news-alert .type .valign{position:relative;top:.125rem}.news-alert .type{float:left;padding-left:1rem;padding-right:1rem;color:#FFF;background-color:#EB212E;border-right:1px solid #FFF}.news-alert .valign{display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;line-height:1.3125rem}.news-alert .alert{overflow:hidden;padding-left:.625rem;padding-right:.625rem;color:#EB212E;border-top:2px solid #EB212E;border-bottom:2px solid #EB212E;background-color:#F5F4F3;font-weight:700}.news-alert .close{float:right;width:3.1875rem;text-align:center;background-color:#EB212E;border-left:1px solid #FFF}.news-alert .btn{top:-1px;margin:0}.fontface .news-alert .no-ff{display:none}@media all and (max-width:41.25em){.news-alert{display:none}}.news-alert .wrap{border-left:1px solid #FFF;border-right:1px solid #FFF}.news-alert .alert,.news-alert .close,.news-alert .type{font-size:1.1875rem;line-height:2.375rem}.fontface .news-alert .icon:before{margin:0;color:#FFF;font-size:2rem}.fontface .news-alert .btn{background-image:none;background-color:transparent}.news-alert .alert:hover{color:#070606}.news-alert .close:hover{background-color:#CC1F28}@media all and (max-width:61.25em){.news-alert .alert,.news-alert .close,.news-alert .type{padding-top:.25rem;font-size:1rem;line-height:2.25rem}.news-alert .type{padding-left:.625rem;padding-right:.625rem}.news-alert .close{width:2.375rem}.news-alert .valign{line-height:1.25rem}.fontface .news-alert .icon:before{font-size:1.625rem}}@media all and (max-width:515em){.news-alert .page-wrap{padding:0}.news-alert .wrap{border:0}}.main-footer .relative{padding-bottom:3.125rem}.main-footer .section-header{padding:1rem 0 0;border:0}.main-footer .section-header .main-text{padding:0;font-size:1.625rem}.main-footer .devices{padding:2.8125rem 0}.main-footer .devices .text,.main-footer .devices-logo,.main-footer .dl{display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle}.main-footer .devices .text{padding:0 3.75rem;color:#88837E;font-size:1.625rem}.main-footer .devices .small{display:block;padding:1rem 0 0;font-size:1.375rem}.main-footer .dl-fig{display:block;margin-bottom:1.0625rem}.main-footer .list{position:absolute;overflow:auto;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;max-width:18.75rem;padding:3rem 0;list-style-type:none;width:25%}.main-footer .list-item{display:block;margin:0 .3125rem}.main-footer .list-item.logo{border:0;padding:0 .625rem .5625rem 1.5625rem;line-height:1;position:relative}.main-footer .icon-brand:before{display:block}.main-footer .list-item a{display:block;padding:.625rem .625rem .625rem 1.5625rem;color:#FFF}.main-footer .devices-logo,.main-footer .dl-fig{max-width:100%}.main-footer .post-preview{margin-bottom:3.125rem}@media all and (max-width:81.25em){.main-footer .devices{text-align:center}.main-footer .devices .text,.main-footer .devices-logo{margin-bottom:2rem}.main-footer .devices .text{display:block;padding:0}.main-footer .relative{position:relative}.main-footer .list{width:50%;max-width:none}}@media all and (max-width:41.25em){.main-footer .list{position:relative;width:auto}.main-footer .list .logo{display:none}.main-footer .relative{padding-bottom:0}}.main-footer .list-item{border-bottom:1px solid #313131;font-size:.9375rem}.main-footer .list-item a:hover{background-color:#313131}.main-footer .list-item.logo:after{display:block;position:absolute;top:0;width:5.25rem;height:5.3125rem;background-color:#EB212E;z-index:0;margin:0;border:1px solid #FFF}.main-footer .list-item.logo:before{color:#FFF;font-size:5.3125rem;line-height:inherit;position:relative;z-index:1}.main-footer .list{background-color:#070606;color:#FFF}.cnil-banner{display:block;position:relative;overflow:hidden;width:100%;padding:.5rem}.cnil-info,.cnil-more{margin:0 4rem 0 0;padding:0;border:0;text-align:left;line-height:1.5rem}.cnil-ok{position:absolute;top:50%;right:1rem;border:0;height:1.5625rem;margin-top:-.78125rem;border-radius:2px}.cnil-banner{background-color:#FFF;color:#070606;border-bottom:1px #F5F4F3 solid;line-height:1;font-size:1rem}.cnil-ok{background-color:#C29127;color:#FFF;font-size:.8125rem}.cnil-more-link{text-decoration:underline;color:#070606}.th01{background-color:#FFF;color:#070606}.th02{background-color:#EB212E;color:#FFF}.th03{background-color:#070606;color:#FFF}.th04{background-color:#EEECEA;color:#313131}.th05{background-color:#F5F4F3;color:#070606}.th06{background-color:#88837E;color:#FFF}.th07{background-color:#A13660;color:#FFF}.th08,.th08 .right-text{background-color:#DEDBD6;color:#070606}.th013,.th09,.th10,.th11,.th12{color:#FFF}.th09{background-color:#CC1F28}.th10{background-color:#55ACEE}.th11{background-color:#3B5998}.th12{background-color:#070606}.th013{background-color:#C29127}

                    Dsol, nous n'avons pas trouv la page que vous avez demande.

                                    <img class="img" src="http://static.rtl2.fr/versions/www/2.0.62/img/error/artiste-1.jpg" alt="" width="492" height="600">
                                </figure>
                                <div class="txt-holder">
                                    <p class="txt">
                                        <span class="strong">Vous recherchez toujours plus de contenu Pop-Rock ?</span>
                                        Essayez donc l'un des liens suivants :
                                    </p>
